note.p: Farmer. Née Lucy Gray. Married Philip Skipworth (1783–1841), farmer of Laceby, Lincolnshire, as his second wife about 1822. Mother of Patricius Grey and Septimus Patrick Skipworth. Farmed in Rothwell, Lincolnshire, 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/639/1/20/11), 1861 (RG9/2392/97/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 February 2018)
Harding, Tim, Eminent Victorian chess players: ten biographies (Jefferson NC: McFarland and Co., 2012), p. 135
